title: Game Won't launch
body: Hello I am having a problem with my game launching at all, I tried launching it from the beta client earlier and it just kept opening a blue window which sat there and didn't do anything. I switched it back to the legacy client and I press the play button to go to the login screen but it just grays out and then lights back up and I can press it over and over again with nothing happening. I was just wondering if anybody could give me some insight on how to fix this. I tried reinstalling it and the same problem happened.

replies.body: Whenever the Play button grays out, it means your network is having a hard time keeping a stable connection with our matchmaking servers. Without a stable connection, the Play button won't let you through because you won't be able to stay connected. Check out the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can get you back on the Rift.
